author: kwright
msg: Try not to leave the world in a messed up state when abandoning connections; this causes any multiple-agent tests to fail once in a while.

author: markt
msg: Previously, resources were only cached if they were smaller than maxObjectSizeBytes. Now they are always cached (so the metadata is cached) but the content is only cached if they are smaller than maxObjectSizeBytes.
